name: revolt.social
long: Exchange about revolt.social, bots, servers and other projects built upon the awesome Revolt stack!

name: Discord Bots
long: Not super duper official, but bots.gg-staff run community of Discord Bots (bots.gg)

name: Revolt Testers
long: Official Revolt Server - run by Revolt.Chat

name:
### Server Name

Unix

### Server Icon URL

https://autumn.revolt.chat/icons/8as3ye3Lmy7JX_qqQhLcXyi6LtjiMvTknbFi3occM2

### Short Server Info

Linux and Unix related discussions.

### Long Server Info

Unix Revolt is a server about everything Unix! If you are an enthusiast, or interested about Linux and other Unix or Unix-like systems, feel free to join!

### Add Tags

linux, unix, unix-like, discussions, help

### Server Owner

aosync

### Server Owner ID

01FD511HD3QEFMH420C5CF6RER

### Invite URL

https://app.revolt.chat/invite/F189TZF5
